title: HAP 06 - Heated Exchanges - Philosophy in Egyptian Narratives and Dialogues

description: Demands for ma’at (justice or truth) and a confrontation with the soul, in the Tale of the Eloquent Peasant and Dispute Between a Man and his Ba.
